alert.note: Alert for Lewis and Southern Nez Perce Counties (Idaho) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Spokane (Eastern Washington and Northern Idaho)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued November 06 at 4:03PM MST by NWS Spokane
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southern Nez Perce and southwestern Lewis Counties through 330 PM PST... At 302 PM PST, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 14 miles southwest of Winchester, or 22 miles south of Lapwai, moving east at 30 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor hail damage to outdoor objects is possible. This storm will remain over mainly rural areas of southern Nez Perce and southwestern Lewis Counties. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Lewis and Southern Nez Perce Counties
